channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Rebukes Putin, Calls Escalation of Attacks ‘Absolutely Crazy’
item.description: “He’s sending rockets into cities and killing people, and I don’t like it at all,” President Trump said of his Russian counterpart.

item.title: Israeli Airstrike Kills Doctor’s Children, Gaza Officials Say
item.description: Two more children were missing, and the doctor’s husband and one other child were injured in the strike on Friday, the officials said. Israel said it ...

item.title: What to Know About the Deadly D.C. Shooting of Israeli Embassy Aides
item.description: Two employees of the Israeli Embassy in Washington were killed. A suspect was charged with murder.

item.title: Singapore’s ComfortDelGro will bid for Melbourne’s rail line as it takes its public transport model global
item.description: “Ten to 14 years ago we were not even in the position to bid for this contract,” ComforDelGro CEO Cheng Siak Kian said in an interview with Fortune.

item.title: US stock futures gain as Trump delays EU tariffs
item.description: To Capital Economics, Trump’s threat of a 50% tariff on the EU from June may well turn out to be a “negotiating tactic” and seems “very unlikely” to b...

item.title: The Israeli Connections to a New Gaza Aid Plan Promoted as Independent
item.description: Foreign contractors are set to carry out a contentious new food aid system in Gaza, displacing experienced aid agencies like the United Nations. It wa...

item.title: Israeli Airstrike Kills Doctor’s Children, Gaza Officials Say
item.description: Two more children were missing, and the doctor’s husband and one other child were injured in the strike on Friday, the officials said. Israel said it ...

item.title: 5 Years After George Floyd’s Murder, the Backlash Takes Hold
item.description: The Black Lives Matter movement, kicked into high gear after Mr. Floyd’s murder on May 25, 2020, has given way to the politics of “white grievance” ch...

item.title: Here’s how the Supreme Court could weaken American exceptionalism in financial markets
item.description: "The Court’s order suggests they'll likely support expanded presidential power in upcoming decisions, giving credence & support to the Unitary Executi...

item.title: Trump extends deadline for 50% tariffs on EU to July 9
item.description: Trump on Friday threatened to impose a 50% tariff on the EU after complaining the bloc was slow-walking negotiations.

item.title: A Quiet Funeral in Israel for Victim of Washington Shooting
item.description: Yaron Lischinsky, 30, was buried on Sunday in the small town where his family lived.

item.title: Jerome Powell tells Princeton grads not to take universities for granted and that ‘integrity is all we have—guard it carefully’
item.description: "Our great universities are the envy of the world and a crucial national asset," Powell said.

item.title: A Quiet Funeral in Israel for Victim of Washington Shooting
item.description: Yaron Lischinsky, 30, was buried on Sunday in the small town where his family lived.

item.title: Venezuela Is Holding an Election for Essequibo, a Region of Neighboring Guyana
item.description: In Sunday’s election, President Nicolás Maduro has called to elect a governor of Essequibo — a region that actually belongs to neighboring Guyana.
